author: craigmcc
msg: Update the release notes document to reflect all the changes since early

Still need to update the main documentation page to reflect the new

author: craigmcc
msg: Modify the <html:select multiple="true"> implementation so that it
correctly marks all of the previously selected options to be marked
"selected" when the form is displayed.
Add a page to the struts-test application to exercise <html:select> both
with and without the multiple="true" setting.
Submitted by: Bruno Antunes <bruno.antunes@whateversoft.com>
PR: Bugzilla #260

msg: Remove default scope so that the configured ActionMapping base class determines
